actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to modify the effective date of Public Law 93-373 which permits U.S. citizens to purchase, hold, sell, or otherwise deal with gold in the United States or abroad.

summary.text: Extends for six months the effective date of Public Law 93-373 whereunder United States citizens are permitted to purchase, hold, sell, or otherwise deal with gold in the United States or abroad.

titles.title: A bill to modify the effective date of Public Law 93-373 which permits U.S. citizens to purchase, hold, sell, or otherwise deal with gold in the United States or abroad.
